website_summaries.verdict: This jukebox speaker's strong suit is versatility. There is an input or output available for virtually all modern audio formats, including USB, Bluetooth, and sound cards.
pros: USB and Bluetooth connectivity turns laptop or WiFi into music source
Compact design, fits almost any space
Sound quality can be enhanced externally
cons: Sound quality is variable, volume can be soft

customer_reviews.title: Very good small audio player that looks like an old jukebox.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had the system for 1 day but I can say that I really like it. I am using it with a 128GB USB flash drive to play Christmas Music. I have a pair of speakers with a sub woofer hooked up to it and it sounds fantastic. Without the added speakers the sound is very good for soft music, not to be cranked up loud. The lights are great. Bluetooth hooked up with no problems to my phone. For the price and features I give it 5 stars. The features I was looking for were USB, Bluetooth and external audio output connection. It's not a fine piece of cabinetry but it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: Jukebox Love
customer_reviews.text: I just received my little jukebox and I love it. I plugged it into my laptop and listened to some prime music and it sounded great. The lighting feature is what really sets it off. The radio and USB feature works well. I used the Bluetooth with my tablet to stream music and that worked perfectly also. This baby is going on my 50's dinette table to give off that diner feel and since I can Bluetooth the music it will be like a little wallbox like the diner's had. You should really get one if you're into the retro era or even if you just want something fun.I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Gotta Have One!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is easy to use and surprisingly good sounding. I have a set of powered speakers & woofer connected which makes it better. It connects to my computer and BluRay player via Bluetooth easily. Pop a flash drive in & you have virtually hours of music. The lighting is terrific and adds to the mood. A definite keeper!
customer_reviews.author: jimmyrabbit

customer_reviews.title: "Very nice Jukebox"
customer_reviews.text: My father grew up during the age when the Jukebox and dinners were king. I thought that this would bring back memories of those golden days with the touch of modern era technology. It's the perfect size and weight for placing it where it's needed. The MP3 has been the only thing used so far but we don't have any good AM/FM stations where we live anyway. All and all a good quality and sounding jukebox at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Lance D.

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work, cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for muy son who is 2 years old so he can listen to some music and see the lights. The product worked just the first day, then never worked again, just the lights. The product has really cheap quality. I based my purchase on some of the reviews i read here which were incorrect. Nobody should buy this product as it's quality is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife to go in her ‘diner’ kitchen. She loves this thing and the neon effect is great! Sound is not the greatest when turned up, but it’s not terrible. Overall, for the price it’s great and has held up even to our young kids playing with it (when they’re not supposed to)!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted. (About 2 days)
customer_reviews.text: At first, very imposing! I did order it used, as it came without the plug to power it. Cheerfully my computer charger worked for it. Led lights were working for a day. Jukebox seems to turn off a few times every song. I Don’t use it as often, but sound quality is decent for the size. If bought new, I’m sure it would be way better than mine; don’t take my word for it though.
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Looks good in photos only
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking in person I tried everything to get a local talk station on this and got nothing but static on any of the very few noises I could hear. No good - returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: S E  Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rock this Jukebox
customer_reviews.text: The lights do not have a multi all at once spectrum like the picture would indicate. The jukebox only rolls through a few colors and not all of the colors in the display. The sound isn’t loud, nor is it crisp. It does it come with a remote either. Product stopped Working after 3 months. No support from company.
customer_reviews.author: Eaglemayhem

customer_reviews.title: The lights didn't work and the speaker is like an old AM radio that my Mom had in ...
customer_reviews.text: The lights didn't work and the speaker is like an old AM radio that my Mom had in the '70's. Very disappointed. I returned the item and am now waiting for my refund to show up on my credit card. All the great reviews on here are misleading to consumers.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute. Hubby wanted a 50s theme dinning room and this is what he came up with. He loves the Bluetooth so he can play 60s music off his phone onto the jukebox
customer_reviews.author: rose bannister

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but not as nice as I expected. Really it's just a fancy radio that other things can be plugged into.
customer_reviews.author: George and Anna Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Even thought you ask to see a jukebox with a CD doesn't mean that's all you will see
customer_reviews.text: When I searched for a jukebox I was looking for a CD player with fm radio. Thought when it said mp3 player it would be the closest to a real looking jukebox that could read CD. It was blue tooth and radio only so the price was outrageous in my opinion for what it offered. Then I could not send back because I bought it early for a gift so I got a double whammy
customer_reviews.author: tinkerlady

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this radio for my home office 5 months ago. As of today there is barely any sound coming out of it with the volume turned all the way up. I cannot return it because the "window" for returns has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reigle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the PARTY!
customer_reviews.text: Great for any type of music you want to play for entertainment at all your parties!

customer_reviews.title: Looking further
customer_reviews.text: Just not what I wanted and antenna is hard to get music clear without static in my game room. Will keep shopping. When it did work the sound was great.

customer_reviews.title: Great look for a tv room
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 8 yr old nephew he is a old soul

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY USED Product
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Jukebox From Wear-house DON’T BUY USED 1st One Came Not Operating This Tome Completely Different BRAND NO Bluetooth NO Remote it looked Nice...

customer_reviews.title: Nice jukebox that worked perfectly for our play production of ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jukebox that worked perfectly for our play production of The Graduate. Plenty of volume and lots of connectivity for media.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great Jukebox
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this jukebox! It is perfect and larger than I actually anticipated it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a CD player but in these times you don't need one because it has everything else from Bluetooth to SD cards LOL I would definitely buy this again and again
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Rip Off
customer_reviews.text: Did not work right - the sound is horrible. It sounds like a 1970 transistor radio. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kish

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Decent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Decent sound quality. Multiple options for connecting devices. Only problem I’ve had is with the USB port. I’ve tried my Android phone and my girlfriends’ iPhone and the jukebox wouldn’t recognize either one. Other than that, decent product.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWarrior

customer_reviews.title: so I love it too
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it, so I love it too. So far, everything works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deb T

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: function buttons have very small print. sound quality is very good. looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: chip creech

customer_reviews.title: This jukebox is way too cool. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This jukebox is way too cool. I highly recommend it. It's small - read the measurements carefully. It puts out nice sound and has many features.
customer_reviews.author: V. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Has alot of other tech features but i wanted the old time look.
customer_reviews.text: From pictures thought the front lit up not just the arch..the led area does not light up so can be hard to see. returning for other one one site.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn m.

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound, very cheaply made. All plastic, ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok sound, very cheaply made. All plastic, even the wood is fake plastic. For the price it is just average. Hey, the lights are neat though.
customer_reviews.author: Skip B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for a table top nice sound great looks with the light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our rec room. Perfect sound for our card nights.
customer_reviews.author: I xray u

customer_reviews.title: A1
customer_reviews.text: THIS JUKEBOX IS AWESOME,EASY TO USE,AND FOR THE PRICE,ITS A STEAL. THANK YOU MANY TIMES

customer_reviews.title: Cute radio
customer_reviews.text: I really like the lights and it is nice. Speakers are not the best but good for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Lights
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to set up and the colors of the lights are very bright and vibrant.

customer_reviews.title: Lights failed after 2 hours play time
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. Sound OK. The lights blew after about 2 hours of play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great in my office
customer_reviews.text: Great Jukebox with really good price. Lights are awesome! with many different possibilities. It is all I expected. Highly recommended...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this jukebox and we've had no issues with any of the functions (primarily radio and bluetooth connection).
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a gift. Took a while to get here buy works well.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the product, it works correctly and it was delivered within the promised date.

customer_reviews.title: Mike in California.
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Everything is working well. Perfect for a counter tops.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She loves it! Stations come in very clear. She loves the lights and how it looks. Excellent product!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is super adorable I love it and it gives off great sounds

customer_reviews.title: ... picture and all so it's look cheap am not happy with it the price so high 😩
customer_reviews.text: Its very small not as its look at the picture and all so it's look cheap am not happy with it the price so high 😩

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Misleading... way too small and doesn't work well..And I have to pay to return it. I'll put it in the closet with some other junk. Don't buy.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is good but the usb port and sd card slot moved ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good but the usb port and sd card slot moved from behind their respective holes so they are not usable.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Jukebox is a lot of fun. Lights are really cool. All worked as advertised. Great buy for the money.

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves the sound and looks of this radio ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves the sound and looks of this radio. Have not had time to try out the Bluetooth yet.

customer_reviews.title: I like it, easy to connect and enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I like it, easy to connect and enjoy, but it lacked more lights so I decided to install some and it was great

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I JUST LOVE THIS. IT IS GREAT. GREAT SOUND NICE TO LOOK AT. LOOKS GREAT IN MY LIVING ROOM SITTING ON TOP OF MY LARGE SONY SPEAKER. THE RADIO SOUNDS BETTER THAN THE RADIO ON MY SONY STEREO. I USE IT MOSTLY FOR SD, AND READS FANTASTIC. PURCHASED THIS ITEM ON JULY 27, 2015. LOVE IT !!!!

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but sounds just ok
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but sounds just ok. Not sure if sound quality is worth the price tag. I do like all the features though!

customer_reviews.title: ugly, bad sound quality

product_meta.title: Pyle PJUB25BT Bluetooth Jukebox MP3 Speaker Player LED Lighting, AM/FM Radio, USB/SD Readers with Aux Input
product_meta.description: The Pyle Retro Jukebox Speaker System combines classic style with modern technology. Stream all of your favorite music through the jukebox's built in speakers. Built in Bluetooth allows you to stream audio wirelessly and it works with all of your favorite devices (iPhone, Android, Smartphone, iPad, Tablet, etc.). USB flash drive and SD memory card readers allow for instant music playback for MP3 digital audio files. Connect even more devices via the Aux (3.5mm) input connector jack or just kick back and listen to AM/FM radio. The unit also features RCA output connector so you can connect to external speaker systems. Enjoy illuminating lights around the frame of the jukebox for a truly genuine and classic style listening experience. Enjoy the best of the old, and the new, with the Pyle Retro Jukebox Speaker System.
feature_bullets: Works with All of Your Favorite Bluetooth Devices (iPhone, Android, Smartphone, iPad, Tablet, MP3 Player, etc.)
Classic Style with Modern Technology Built in Bluetooth for Wireless Music Streaming
USB Flash & SD Card Readers MP3 Digital Audio File Support Aux (3.5mm) Input Connector Jack
Rear RCA (L/R) Output Connector Jacks Ability to Connect Additional External Devices
Built in Stereo Speakers AM/FM Radio Jukebox Illuminating Lights LCD Digital Display Panel
